title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Mobile Microlearning Course for Leadership Development in Scientific Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate expertise in science, basic digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply effective communication and collaboration strategies in science project teams.
Learners can lead problem-solving in scientific fields by utilizing conflict management and decision-making skills.
Learners can analyze practical examples of digital tool-based leadership and apply them to real-world situations.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
